messages.message: @Ted or @Jessica i see that ibdoc no longer has an onPageView callback, which is what's causing the missing page number issue Anant reported. Is there a replacement function for that?
i just have it defaulting to the first page, but we should work on a more permanent solution
Ah okay. So this is what handles what the page number is for autodetect?
yea it's used in that api call if that's what you mean

Two options here: a) There's a listener that figures out what the current page most in view is, and we can send onPageView whenever that changes (we might have to put something in the UI about how the autodetect is for "this page") or b) We can make autodetect work on all pages at once (too slow?)

i think i'm in favor of a) regardless of what we end up deciding for autodetect because i imagine knowing what page is in view is useful for other apps. For auto-detect, it might be slow to run on all pages at once, so I lean towards keeping it for one page only
Sounds good, will put up a PR this afternoon to add it back in
